channel.title: Arrav - We have returned!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cF66vOs.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][U]Links:[/U][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
[ul][*][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jchuHax.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://arravrsps.com/"]HomePage[/URL] [*][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aOVfknV.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://community.arravrsps.com/"]Community Forum[/URL] [*][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S0vwpL4.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://arravrsps.com/download/launcher.jar"]Download[/URL]
[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][U]Developer Team:[/U][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
Dark - Founder/Developer[/ul]
[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][U]Notice:[/U][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
[B][I]Yes, we are using the Arrav name. No, we're not the owners of Arrav that shut down the server three times on their players and then twice more when they ran Ikov. We are simply people who enjoyed playing Arrav when it was online and wanted to provide the same environment once again for players to enjoy. We've got a fresh Economy going and we're working toward perfecting the server content in an attempt to provide you with optimal game-play.[/I][/B]
[SIZE=3][B]Official Development Log:[/B][/SIZE]
[CODE] * Player-Saving has been re-written. All character files are now loading through .JSON files. * All NPC Chat-Heads have been fixed. * Agility Course has been fixed. * Starters have been limited to 2 per-IP. * SetLevel & SetOtherLevel Command Added. (for Administrator usage). * A small delay has been added when thieving stalls. (Still good profit). * The camera will now have a small rotation after "X" number of clicks on a thieving stall. * Account Nulling issue has been fixed. * Donation Interval system Added. * All delay's have been fixed. (Occurred due to a*weak referencing issue). * Source Cycle rate fixed. * Home Command Added. * NPCSize has been re-written*(Much less memory cost). * 508 objects have been removed (Now only loading 377/634). * Mouse-Wheel screen-panning. * Attack-overlay added. * HP-displayed over-head added. * Anti-aliasing implemented into the client. * Dagannoth*kings map fixed. * Corporeal Beast sound-achieve file fixed. - Actual Corporeal Beast maps added as well. * GWD missing model added (Fixes the map errors). * 32k Object Support Added. * Login-Screen Account Management System Added. [/CODE]
[B][SIZE=5]Features:[/SIZE][/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wIeG06Q.png[/img][B][SIZE=3] Features Include:[/SIZE][/B] [ul][*]Over 20 In-game Bosses. [*]Over 10 In-game Minigames. [*]Advanced Menu Teleporting [*]Dicing and flowergame [*]Effigies [*]Clan Chat [*]Over 1600 npc's prespawned (this excludes npc's of minigames and dungeoneering) [*]Over 1,500 have drops (most of them the same drop the same items as they do on Runescape) [*]Npc Agression [*]Lottery [*]Bank Pins [*]Donator islands [*]Fully working dwarf multicannon [*]Pk points system and killstreak [*]Completionist cape [*]Support for multiple gameframes [*]Up to 666 Revision Data. [*]New Hitmarks + combat style icons [*]Over 120+ Achievements [Easy, Medium, Hard, Elite] [*]Dungeoneering [*]Social Slayer (Duo Slayer) [*]Daily Updates [*]Active Community Forums [*]& so many more brilliant features that we simply cannot list them all. So, join today and find out for yourself![/COLOR][/ul]
[B][SIZE=5]Media:[/SIZE][/B]
[SPOILER=Media][IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/6864417b8172a8e83fdbdf87867baacb.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/4ec3185861b611e06ac07c9c9d49aae2.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/54a3e84ae47c7d53e9b143342930ce1a.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/2764782f910ef5d6e43e2b1c1a5e7325.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/ad7035c34d5c69ad0aeb91b5b536fd72.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/3c48e070ca513f16df54a9c87adbccfd.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[B][SIZE=3]Credits:[/SIZE][/B]
[b]Rene/Jordan/Arithium/Supah Fly/Mike[/b][*]For their work on this base. [b]Artem[/b][*]For his graphic work.

item.title: Arrav - We have returned!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

i’d say go play ikov since it was made by rene but apparently he got too rich from that and got bored

Read full topic

item.title: Arrav - We have returned!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Arrav only shut down once, what you talking about? There was a remake that was made after Arrav shut down but it wasn’t owned by either me or the other original owners.

Read full topic

item.title: Arrav - We have returned!
item.dc:creator: @CSharp95 CSharp95
item.description:
@CSharp95 wrote:

I’ve always noticed a theme in advert threads where they list all the features that either came with their base or every other sever has and then saying “and so many more unique things” right after. They never list the stuff that sets them apart.

Either way, I enjoyed arrav briefly before, so maybe I’ll give it a chance.

Read full topic

item.title: Arrav - We have returned!
item.dc:creator: @DarkArrav DarkArrav
item.description:
@DarkArrav wrote:

[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][U]Links:[/U][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]

[ul][] [URL=http://“http://arravrsps.com/”]HomePage[/URL]
[] [URL=http://“http://community.arravrsps.com/”]Community Forum[/URL]
[*] [URL=http://“http://arravrsps.com/download/launcher.jar”]Download[/URL]

[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][U]Developer Team:[/U][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]

Dark - Founder/Developer[/ul]

[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Georgia][U]Notice:[/U][/FONT][/SIZE][/B]

[B][I]Yes, we are using the Arrav name. No, we’re not the owners of Arrav that shut down the server three times on their players and then twice more when they ran Ikov. We are simply people who enjoyed playing Arrav when it was online and wanted to provide the same environment once again for players to enjoy. We’ve got a fresh Economy going and we’re working toward perfecting the server content in an attempt to provide you with optimal game-play.[/I][/B]

[SIZE=3][B]Official Development Log:[/B][/SIZE]

[CODE]

  • Player-Saving has been re-written. All character files are now loading through .JSON files.
  • All NPC Chat-Heads have been fixed.
  • Agility Course has been fixed.
  • Starters have been limited to 2 per-IP.
  • SetLevel & SetOtherLevel Command Added. (for Administrator usage).
  • A small delay has been added when thieving stalls. (Still good profit).
  • The camera will now have a small rotation after “X” number of clicks on a thieving stall.
  • Account Nulling issue has been fixed.
  • Donation Interval system Added.
  • All delay’s have been fixed. (Occurred due to a*weak referencing issue).
  • Source Cycle rate fixed.
  • Home Command Added.
  • NPCSize has been re-written*(Much less memory cost).
  • 508 objects have been removed (Now only loading 377/634).
  • Mouse-Wheel screen-panning.
  • Attack-overlay added.
  • HP-displayed over-head added.
  • Anti-aliasing implemented into the client.
  • Dagannoth*kings map fixed.
  • Corporeal Beast sound-achieve file fixed. - Actual Corporeal Beast maps added as well.
  • GWD missing model added (Fixes the map errors).
  • 32k Object Support Added.
  • Login-Screen Account Management System Added.
    [/CODE]

[B][SIZE=5]Features:[/SIZE][/B]

[B][SIZE=3] Features Include:[/SIZE][/B]
[ul][]Over 20 In-game Bosses.
[]Over 10 In-game Minigames.
[]Advanced Menu Teleporting
[]Dicing and flowergame
[]Effigies
[]Clan Chat
[]Over 1600 npc’s prespawned (this excludes npc’s of minigames and dungeoneering)
[]Over 1,500 have drops (most of them the same drop the same items as they do on Runescape)
[]Npc Agression
[]Lottery
[]Bank Pins
[]Donator islands
[]Fully working dwarf multicannon
[]Pk points system and killstreak
[]Completionist cape
[]Support for multiple gameframes
[]Up to 666 Revision Data.
[]New Hitmarks + combat style icons
[]Over 120+ Achievements [Easy, Medium, Hard, Elite]
[]Dungeoneering
[]Social Slayer (Duo Slayer)
[]Daily Updates
[]Active Community Forums
[]& so many more brilliant features that we simply cannot list them all. So, join today and find out for yourself![/COLOR][/ul]

[B][SIZE=5]Media:[/SIZE][/B]

[SPOILER=Media]

[/SPOILER]

[B][SIZE=3]Credits:[/SIZE][/B]

Rene/Jordan/Arithium/Supah Fly/Mike[]For their work on this base.
Artem[]For his graphic work.

Read full topic
